## Setup

```{r Ecopath}

library(Rpath)
  source("R/merge_ecofitting.R")
  source("R/ecofitting_plots.R")

  rsim.plot(params$run_fit)


```

## Table of negative-log likelihoods
```{r fittable}

  rsim.fit.table(params$scene_fit, params$run_fit)

```

## Results
```{r fitplots, fig.height=1.8}

s_list <- c(rpath.living(params$bal),rpath.detrital(params$bal))

for(sp in s_list){
  rsim.plot.full(params$scene_fit, params$run_fit, sp)
}

```
